text:

Click to share on Twitter (Opens in new window)

'I Don't Do Cocaine!' Kelly & Vicki's Nasty Feud Ends In Screaming & Tears At Reunion Dodd said she will quit the show if Gunvalson isn't fired over shocking drug claim.

The Real Housewives of Orange County reunion part one caused some serious damage — weeks after it was shot!

As RadarOnline.com readers know, Vicki Gunvalson and Kelly Dodd‘s friendship crumbled at the beginning of season 13, when Vicki, 56, set up Kelly’s ex-husband Michael on a date with one of their mutual girlfriends — behind Kelly’s back.

Part one started off with Andy Cohen breaking the ice by telling Vicki that he was admiring her new face.

Meanwhile, Shannon Beador dropped the first bombshell by telling Andy, 50, that she’d lost 32 pounds since last season.

After Vicki talked about having a life insurance policy on her ex-husband Donn Gunvalson, Tamra Judge said, “I didn’t know you could do that.”

Vicki replied, “Well you have a life insurance out on Eddie.” As Radar previously reported, Eddie Judge recently underwent his fifth heart procedure and it seemed to have been a success!

Andy then asked Shannon, 54, “You said that Vicki told you this season that Brooks was her soulmate,” referring to her cancer-faking ex, Brooks Ayers. He then asked about Vicki’s current boyfriend, Steve Lodge.

“What was interesting was Steve trying to keep a lid on her behavior because Steve told her to behave,” said Shannon.

Tamra, 51, jumped in, telling the cast that she approved of Steve. But they all voiced how they didn’t like how he controlled her party-girl behavior!

After a long discussion on the matter, the entire cast agreed that Steve was overbearing on Vicki, at which point the star herself revealed that couple’s therapy was looking necessary.

“Who thinks that Vicki and Steve are getting married?” asked Andy.

Vicki raised her hand, “Season 14!” she screamed.

The next topic of conversation was new cast member Gina Kirschenheiter‘s mysterious divorce from husband and baby-daddy, Matt Kirschenheiter.

“Did you start the show knowing that your marriage was over,” Andy asked Gina, 34.

“I started the show knowing that Matt and I were in a horrible down. But I didn’t know that down was going to cause me to pull the trigger,” she admitted.

“Matt couldn’t film because he would have lost his job,” Gina said, adding that she had not told their kids yet and that she and Matt stopped having sex.

“I feel bad. No matter what happens, I really want to have a good relationship with him because it is forever,” Gina added, while crying her eyes out.

Andy then went into Kelly Dodd, 43, and Vicki — who went from friends to mortal enemies.

“Is Michael still dating the woman that you set her up with?” Andy asked Vicki, clearly fueling the fire.

“No. He is dating someone new. We met her in July. They went to the Huntington Beach Parade and we met her,” Vicki told Andy.

Andy asked a question from a viewer that was on everyone’s minds. “Kelly do you have a problem with Michael hanging out with Vicki and Steve?”

“I don’t have an issue with Michael hanging out with Vicki and Steve. I was freshly divorced. I didn’t know that she had hooked them up. I had to find out from someone else,” she said. “If she would have told me I would be fine. It was a girl that we were both friends with. I am not friends with her anymore.”

“They didn’t want me to say anything. They only went on three dates and Michael didn’t want you to know,” said Kelly, defending her decision to betray Vicki.

Then came the bombshell of all bombshells! Vicki started the confrontation by calling Kelly a “loud mouth.”

Kelly fired back, “Big a** mouth. Turn around and look at yourself in the mirror.”

Vicki then dropped the mother bomb, telling Kelly, “I don’t do cocaine!”

Kelly responded, “I don’t do cocaine either.”

Vicki revealed that Michael was the one who told her that Kelly did cocaine and that he was “miserable” their entire marriage.

And after Bravo leaked the shocking clip last week, Kelly said that if Vicki doesn’t get fired she is going to quit!

The reunion part one ended with Kelly acting hysterical on the phone with Michael.

Tune in to The Real Housewives of Orange County reunion part 2, next Sunday at 9/8 Central only on Bravo!

Do you think that Kelly Dodd will quit? Should Vicki Gunvalson get fired? Sound off in the comments.

We pay for juicy info! Do you have a story for RadarOnline.com? Email us at tips@radaronline.com, or call us at (866) ON-RADAR (667-2327) any time, day or night.

title: 'RHOC' Recap: Vicki Gunvalson Accuses Kelly Dodd Of Doing Cocaine

meta_data.description: The 'RHOC' season 13 part one reunion was nasty! See Kelly Dodd's nasty 'cocaine' battle with Vicki Gunvalson that caused Kelly to threaten to quit if Vicki isn't fired!
